END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT

NitroDesk will provide Licensed Customer with a unique license key for each license purchased that will be shipped via e-mail to the Licensed Customer contact identified in writing by Licensed Customer (as may be updated from time to time).  It will be Licensed Customerï¿½s responsibility to provide such license keys to each end user
Under this license, you may: (i) install and use the Software for your personal, internal use, (ii) copy the Software for back-up or archival purposes. (iii)You may not distribute the software to others without first obtaining the required licenses, where applicable.
Whether you are licensing the Software as an individual or on behalf of an entity, you may not: (i) reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Software or attempt to discover the source code; (ii) modify, or create derivative works based upon, the Software in whole or in part without the express written consent of  NitroDesk Inc.; (iii) distribute copies of the Software; (iv) remove any proprietary notices or labels on the Software; (v) resell, lease, rent, transfer, sublicense, or otherwise transfer rights to the Software;(vi)install or execute the software on any device other than a mobile phone handset;(vii)install or execute the software on a device connected to any type of debugging apparatus. 
2. Current Release License: 
You acknowledge that you are purchasing the current release of the software, and not a perpetual license to all future versions of the product.  
3. NitroDesk: 
You acknowledge that no title to the intellectual property in the Software is transferred to you. Title, ownership, rights, and intellectual property rights in and to the Software shall remain that of NitroDesk Inc. The Software is protected by copyright and patent laws of the United States and international treaties. 
4. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY: 
YOU AGREE THAT  NitroDesk Inc. HAS MADE NO EXPRESS WARRANTIES, ORAL OR WRITTEN, TO YOU REGARDING THE PRODUCTS AND THAT THE PRODUCTS ARE BEING PROVIDED TO YOU 'AS IS' WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. ALSO

THIS LIMITATION SHALL APPLY TO CLAIMS OF PERSONAL INJURY TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW. 
6. TERMINATION: 
This Agreement shall terminate automatically if you fail to comply with the limitations described in this Agreement. No notice shall be required to effectuate such termination. Upon termination, you must remove and destroy all copies of the Software. 
7. EXTERNAL SERVICES: 
NitroDesk may rely on external services and service providers to provide you with capabilities to interoperate with such services. NitroDesk Inc will not be liable or responsible for any issues arising with the usage of such external parties such as, but not limited to, reduced performance, lack of connectivity, corrupted data. NitroDesk will pursue all commercially reasonable viable means to ensure connectivity and interoperability with the services. But it cannot completely guarantee continued service or connectivity with one or all of such services in the future. 
You are encouraged to first verify the performance of the program before you purchase it. Due to the nature of the software and the dependencies to other entities, NitroDesk will not be able to refund you the cost of the software for any reason, including but not limited to future inability to connect to your service provider.
8. MISCELLANEOUS:
Severability.
In the event of invalidity of any provision of this Agreement, the parties agree that such invalidity shall not affect the validity of the remaining portions of this Agreement.
Export.
You agree that you will not export or re-export the Software outside of the jurisdiction in which you obtained it without the appropriate United States or foreign government licenses.

The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods is specifically disclaimed.
Entire Agreement.  
You agree that this is the entire agreement between you and  NitroDesk Inc., which supersedes any prior agreement, whether written or oral, and all other communications between  NitroDesk Inc. and you relating to the subject matter of this Agreement. 
REDISTRIBUTED CODE
